dp.name: Dynamic Programming Mastery
dp.description: Solve complex optimization problems. Master multidimensional state transitions, bitmasking, and space-reduction techniques to turn O(2^N) into O(N^3).

seo.title: Dynamic Programming - L4/L5 FAANG Algorithms Guide
seo.description: Advanced Dynamic Programming problems for senior-level FAANG interviews.

graphs.name: Graph Algorithms Mastery
graphs.description: Model complex relationships. Implement advanced shortest paths (Dijkstra, Bellman-Ford), Network Flow, and Disjoint Set Union (DSU) for real-world connectivity.

seo.title: Graph Algorithms - L4/L5 FAANG Algorithms Guide
seo.description: Advanced Graph Algorithms for senior-level FAANG interviews: flows, matching, shortest paths.

trees.name: Advanced Tree Algorithms
trees.description: Handle hierarchical data at scale. Master Segment Trees for range queries, Binary Lifting for LCA, and Trie structures for prefix matching.

seo.title: Advanced Trees - L4/L5 FAANG Algorithms Guide
seo.description: Advanced Tree algorithms: Segment trees, Fenwick trees, LCA, tree DP for Codeforces problems.

strings.name: Advanced String Algorithms
strings.description: Process massive text data. Master KMP for linear-time matching, Rolling Hash for efficient comparison, and Tries for diverse alphabet inputs.

seo.title: String Algorithms - L4/L5 FAANG Algorithms Guide
seo.description: Advanced String algorithms: KMP, Rabin-Karp, suffix arrays, Z-algorithm for Codeforces problems.

specialized.name: Specialized Algorithms
specialized.description: Master advanced mathematical concepts. From FFT and Cryptography to the Diffusion equations powering modern AI.

seo.title: Specialized Algorithms - L4/L5 FAANG Algorithms Guide
seo.description: Advanced specialized algorithms: FFT, Convex Hull, Modular Arithmetic, and Diffusion equations.

design.name: System Design Patterns
design.description: Architect massive-scale systems. Master trade-offs between consistency and availability (CAP), database sharding strategies, and resilient distributed patterns for 100M+ users.

seo.title: System Design - L4/L5 FAANG Algorithms Guide
seo.description: System Design: rate limiting, caching, load balancing, distributed systems for L4/L5 interviews.

optimization.name: Optimization Techniques
optimization.description: Squeeze maximum efficiency. Master Sliding Window, Monotonic Queues, and 'Binary Search on Answer' to solve constraints that seem impossible.

seo.title: Optimization Techniques - L4/L5 FAANG Algorithms Guide
seo.description: Optimization techniques: two pointers, binary search, divide and conquer, meet in the middle for Codeforces.

homepage.algorithmCategoriesSubtitle: Master the fundamentals across all major algorithmic domains

hero.description: Interactive guide for senior-level algorithm problems. From dynamic programming mastery to system design patterns - everything you need for top tech interviews.

cards.title: Caching
cards.quote: There are only two hard things in Computer Science: cache invalidation and naming things.
cards.author: Phil Karlton

cards.title: CAP Theorem
cards.quote: Consistency, Availability, Partition Tolerance. Pick two.
cards.author: Eric Brewer
cards.lesson: When the network cable is cut, do you lie to the user or show an error?

cards.title: Premature Optimization
cards.quote: Premature optimization is the root of all evil.
cards.author: Donald Knuth
cards.lesson: Don't build a distributed system when a single Postgres instance will do.
